adverb.description: In or to the backstage area in a theater.
examples: I went backstage after the show

adjective.description: Relating to or situated in the area behind the stage in a theater.
examples: a backstage tour of the opera house

noun.description: The area in a theater out of view of the audience, especially in the wings or dressing rooms.
examples: backstage was the scene of pleasant pandemonium
